enabled.description: Indicates whether a defined automatic rollback configuration is currently enabled for this Deployment Group. If you enable automatic rollback, you must specify at least one event type.

events.description:
The event type or types that trigger a rollback. Supported types are `DEPLOYMENT_FAILURE`, `DEPLOYMENT_STOP_ON_ALARM` and `DEPLOYMENT_STOP_ON_REQUEST`.

_Only one `auto_rollback_configuration` is allowed_.
